title: Barge Pie
directions: In an 8×8 pan press down the 1st layer ingredients after you mix them all together.
Mix together the ingredients of the second layer and spread over the crust.
Mix the pudding according to the package instructions with 2 cups of milk and pour over the 2nd layer. Refrigerate for 15 minutes.
Spread the cool whip over the 3rd layer and sprinkle heath bits over the top or any other topping you like.
Place in the fridge until ready to serve and Enjoy!
Easy, peasy and creamy! It’s so fun to make this pie and it’s super easy! I’m sure that if you try it, you will love it!
ingredients: 1 heaping cup of graham crackers crumbs.
¼ cup of melted unsalted butter.
½ scant cup of powdered sugar.
½ large tub of cool whip.
½ cup of all natural creamy peanut butter.
½ large tub of cool whip.
